name: Barbirintico
description:
Barbara starts dreaming that she is in the body of Louise Belcher and her favorite food in the world will be gone forever... So, she has to hurry and run around in the most bizarre places, while searching for all the remaining pizza!

This game is just a simple prototype, resulting from my first experience with Unity. It was made entirely with assets retrieved from Sketchfab and the Unity Asset Store. This project is not affiliated with Bob's Burgers or 20th Century Fox, and I do not own any of the brand rights. No copyright infringement intended.

You can play the game either with the keyboard or a joystick controller.

Here is the list of controls:

INPUTACTIONArrow keys or ASWD keys (Keyboard)

Left stick (Joystick controller)Move aroundESC key (Keyboard)
Pause Level
Exit Game (on the Main Menu or when the level is paused)SPACE bar (Keyboard)

Start Button (Joystick controller)Start Game
Proceed
Unpause Level (when paused)
Pause Level (only for the Start Button on the Joystick Controller)

  • Level 1 Maze Model: akil44 on Sketchfab
  • Level 2 Maze Model: victor.darras on Sketchfab
  • Skyboxes: Borodar on Unity Asset Store
  • Level 1 Maze Texture: shelbyallison on Spoonflower
  • Pizza Icon: Maynruzfsdw on PNGFLY

  • Creepy Amusement Park by Derek & Brandon Fiechter on YouTube
